properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 23 at 10:37PM EST until January 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...East then southeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to
25 kt Friday evening into early Saturday morning, then south
around 15 kt until late Saturday morning. Waves around 3 ft
expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA
and Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA.

* WHEN...From 10 PM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY
